Since milk fat high saturate fat , expert advise whole dairy product ( e.g. , milk yogurt ) . However , bioactive fat , occur milk fat , may beneficial prevention diabetes . Current data provide compel evidence moderate intake saturate fat milk fat increase risk diabetes . Milk fat contains unique variety bioactive fat , may beneficial may counterbalance potential negative effect saturate fat . The investigator hypothesize milk fat favorable effect metabolic risk marker associate metabolic syndrome . Therefore , study test hypothesis milk-fat intake : ( ) result improve insulin sensitivity , ( ii ) favorably alter postprandial lipid metabolism , ( iii ) result lower circulating concentration pro-inflammatory marker . This study recruit 20-24 ( total ) female male subject blind , randomize , crossover design consist two experimental diet ( 3 week arm ) base DASH-like diet ( Dietary Approaches Stop Hypertension diet ) % Energy ( E % ) : 55 E % carbohydrate , 15 E % protein , 30 E % fat ( 9 E % saturate fatty acid ( SFA ) , 15 E % monounsaturated fatty acid ( MUFA ) , 6 E % polyunsaturated fatty acid ( PUFA ) ) .
